thread.title: Britney Spears shares topless photo to Instagram | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Britney Spears shares topless photo to Instagram | Daily Mail Online

author: Sarah Sotoodeh For Dailymail.Com
title: Britney Spears shares topless photo to Instagram | Daily Mail Online
text: Share The gorgeous star rocked smokey lined lids and defined brows. Her stunning snap come just one day after Lifetime premiere their biopic film Britney Ever After; the musician wanted nothing to do with film. Views: Last week, Britney enjoyed a 'family weekend getaway in Malibu' In August, Britney's rep told Dailymail.com that the singer will 'will not be contributing in any way, shape or form to the Lifetime biopic nor does it have her blessing.' Last week, Britney enjoyed a 'family weekend getaway in Malibu.' She posed in front of a negative-edge pool while rocking a ruffled dress and heels. In the caption, the beauty thanked Airbnb for the 'gift of this lovely home.' Britney often shows off her flawless toned figure on social media; she recently gave her followers a peek at her stretching routine. Fit: Britney often shows off her flawless toned figure on social media; she recently gave her followers a peek at her stretching routine She posted another revealing snap last summer in Hawaii while rocking just bikini bottoms with her back facing the camera. The Crossroads actress is mom to two sons: Sean, 11, and Jayden, 10, with her ex-husband Kevin Federline. Britney is currently on break from her Las Vegas residency; she is set to return to the Planet Hollywood stage on March 22. The star will perform in Sin City until September of this year; her first show for her Britney: Piece Of Me was on December 27, 2013. Amazing: She posted another revealing snap last summer in Hawaii while rocking just bikini bottoms with her back facing the camera Doting mom: The Crossroads actress is mom to two sons: Sean, 11, and Jayden, 10, with her ex-husband Kevin Federline Share or comment on this article Most watched News videos
